kb3.name: kb3_ships
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_ships` ( `shp_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `shp_name` char(64) NOT NULL, `shp_class` int(11) NOT NULL default '18', `shp_externalid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `shp_rce_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `shp_baseprice` bigint(12) NOT NULL default '0', `shp_techlevel` tinyint(4) NOT NULL default '1', PRIMARY KEY (`shp_id`), UNIQUE KEY `shp_name` (`shp_name`), KEY `shp_class` (`shp_class`) ) Type=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
